entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 24.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the morning then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 24. UV index 9 or very high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then light overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
